description.value:
A large, stylized symbol of an eye adorns the top of this wooden staff, representing the watchful eye of the divine powers. The bearer of the staff can guide and protect, seeing bounties and tragedies that could befall them in the future.

When wielding this staff, you gain a +1 item bonus on Survival checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Sense Direction]{Sense Direction} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Subsist]{Subsist}, and to Religion checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge]{Recall Knowledge}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Guidance]{Guidance}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Light]{Light}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Bless]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Create Water]{Create Water}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Augury]{Augury}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Create Food]{Create Food}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.See Invisibility]{See Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Status]{Status}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Safe Passage]{Safe Passage}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Wanderer's Guide]{Wanderer's Guide}
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Remove Curse]{Remove Curse}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Spell Immunity]{Spell Immunity}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Status]{Status}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Prying Eye]{Prying Eye}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.See Invisibility]{See Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Spell Immunity]{Spell Immunity}
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Spell Immunity]{Spell Immunity}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Scintillating Safeguard]{Scintillating Safeguard}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.True Seeing]{True Seeing}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
